Text.val: 13.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
10.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (DRFT)
04.02.2011 GB SCR16191 Changed name of program

SQL_STMT_U.val: select count(*), cast (sum (DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/DRFT where DRFT_DEBC_NO = :2 and :3
